data.title: Serving Re-size
data.statement: George is looking for the best value snack food in his local supermarket. He doesn't care about calories; to George all that matters is weight.
data.constraints:
0 < [[n]] < 50
There will never be a tie between any two items
data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read name:word(19) quantity:int price:int
write Most cost-effective snack
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> [[n]] The number of snack foods George will be comparing

<<Next [[n]] lines:>>
    String [[snackName]], Integer [[snackWeight]] (in kilograms), and Integer [[snackPrice]] (in Rai Stones) separated by spaces
data.outputDescription: The <<name>> of the most cost-effective snack food.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

George is looking for the best value snack food in his local supermarket. He doesn't care about calories; to George all that matters is weight.
Input
Line 1: n The number of snack foods George will be comparing

Next n lines:
String snackName, Integer snackWeight (in kilograms), and Integer snackPrice (in Rai Stones) separated by spaces
Output
The name of the most cost-effective snack food.
Constraints
0 < n < 50
There will never be a tie between any two items
Example
Input
3
Rice_Crackers 2 15
Wonderchocolate 3 20
Doughnuts 2 25
Output
Wonderchocolate
